definition: in the years of/during those years/period (of dynasty or decade)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: He may have been influenced by the prophet Isaiah whose ministry covered much of Hezekiah's reign.
sentences.chinese: 以赛亚主要是在希西家在位年间作先知的事奉。

sentences.english: Ever since, the One-Thousand-Angle Light has been out of sight for 37 years.
sentences.chinese: 自此以后，千角灯就在37年间再也没有出现过。

sentences.english: During the years of Jiajing in Ming Dynasty, a scholar named Fan Qin had a hobby in collecting books.
sentences.chinese: 明代嘉靖年间有一个人叫范钦，一生嗜好藏书。

sentences.english: During the Eastern Jin Dynasty, there was an old fisherman in Wuling.
sentences.chinese: 东晋年间，武陵有一个老渔夫。

sentences.english: Bismarck was enormously powerful in his 26 years as Prussia's political leader.
sentences.chinese: 在担任普鲁士政治领袖的26年间，俾斯麦位高权重。

sentences.english: Zhenyuan ordained at East Bridge in rivers and mountains, was built in the Ming Dynasty Hongwu years.
sentences.chinese: 位于镇远县城东中河山，始建于明朝洪武年间。

sentences.english: While subjective powerlessness was still important, no significant changes were seen in this across the decade.
sentences.chinese: 而主观无力感仍是重要因素，十年间并未有太大改变。

sentences.english: Shunzhi of the Qing Dynasty, in the capital of "Man-Han-city living."
sentences.chinese: 清初顺治年间，在京城实行“满汉分城居住”。

sentences.english: Over the intervening 109 years, more than 500 prizes have been awarded.
sentences.chinese: 在此的109年间，一共颁发了500多个诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: Then there was a famine in the days of David three years, year after year; and David enquired of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 大卫年间有饥荒，一连三年，大卫就求问耶和华。

sentences.english: In the last decade or so, the boundaries of what is patentable have expanded.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的约10年间，可取得专利的范围被扩展。

sentences.english: History textbooks have been dumbed down over the past decade.
sentences.chinese: 过去十年间，历史教材已被修改得过于简单。

sentences.english: In actual fact, the house of sapphire blue has grown a lot for the period of 2 years, between 3th album (3jib) and 4th album (4jib).
sentences.chinese: 知道吗，其实蓝家在三辑四辑的两年间成长了更多。

sentences.english: Chapter V is the decade before the Revolution of the civil commotion.
sentences.chinese: 第五章是对辛亥革命前十年间民变的思考。

sentences.english: During this one-year period, two peaks were noted.
sentences.chinese: 在这一年间，香港一共录得两个高锋期。

sentences.english: This took place in the year of Jingkang and it is known as the Humiliation of Jingkang.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情发生在靖康年间，故被称为靖康之耻。

definition: a few years/several years/how many years
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
flourishing age (of the ceremonial tripod)/golden age
